Timezone.description: Represents a timezone as an IANA timezone string.

Instant.description: Represents an instant in time as an ISO 8601 string.

UserDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a user.
Represents a user with their personal information, login credentials, preferences, and display name.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

login.description: The login username of the user.

firstName.description:
The first name of the user.
Can be `null` if not provided.

lastName.description:
The last name of the user.
Can be `null` if not provided.

email.description:
The email address of the user.
Can be `null` if not provided.

language.description: The preferred language of the user.

timezone.description: The preferred timezone of the user.

friendlyName.description: The friendly display name of the user.

Page_UserDTO_.description: Represents a paginated response containing an array of elements.

content.description: The content of the page - an array of elements.

totalElements.description: The total number of elements across all pages.

size.description: The size of the page, i.e., the maximum number of elements per page.

number.description: The number of the current page, starting at 0.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages (which can be 0 if there are no elements).

UserCommandDTO.description:
Command Data Transfer Object for creating or updating a user.
Used as the request body for user creation/update endpoints.

login.description: The login username of the user.

firstName.description:
The first name of the user.
Can be `null` if not provided.

lastName.description:
The last name of the user.
Can be `null` if not provided.

email.description:
The email address of the user.
Can be `null` if not provided.

language.description: The preferred language of the user.

timezone.description: The preferred timezone of the user.

ChangePasswordCommand.description:
Command for changing a user's password.
Used as the request body for password change endpoints.

currentPassword.description: The current password of the user.

newPassword.description: The new password for the user.

OIBusObjectAttribute.description:
Object-type attribute that groups related attributes.
Used to create nested form structures.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

attributes.description: Child attributes contained within this object.

enablingConditions.description: Conditions that determine when this object should be enabled.

OIBusAttributeDisplayProperties.description:
Display properties for individual form attributes.
Controls layout and visibility in form view.

row.description: The row position in the form layout (1-based index).

columns.description: The number of columns this attribute should span.

displayInViewMode.description: Whether this attribute should be displayed in view mode.

OIBusAttributeType.description: Type representing the possible attribute types for OIBus form elements.

OIBusAttributeValidatorType.description: Type representing the possible validator types for OIBus form attributes.

OIBusAttributeValidator.description:
Validator configuration for OIBus form attributes.
Defines validation rules and their parameters.

type.description: The type of validator to apply.

arguments.description:
Arguments for the validator.
For example, for MINIMUM validator: ["10"] would set minimum value to 10.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

OIBusCodeAttribute.description: Code editor attribute for SQL or JSON content.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

contentType.description: Type of content for syntax highlighting.

OIBusStringSelectAttribute.description: Dropdown select attribute with predefined string options.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

OIBusSecretAttribute.description:
Secret/password input attribute.
Value is masked in the UI.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

unit.description:
Unit of measurement for this number (e.g., "ms", "kb").
Displayed next to the input field.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

OIBusScanModeAttribute.description:
Scan mode selection attribute.
Used for configuring how often data should be collected.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

acceptableType.description:
What types of scan modes are acceptable.
POLL: Regular interval polling
SUBSCRIPTION: Real-time subscription
SUBSCRIPTION_AND_POLL: Both real-time and polling

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

OIBusArrayAttribute.description:
Array attribute for managing collections of objects.
Used for repeatable sections in forms.

key.description: The unique key/identifier for this attribute.

validators.description: Validators to apply to this attribute.

paginate.description: Whether to paginate the array elements.

numberOfElementPerPage.description: Number of elements to display per page when paginated.

rootAttribute.description: The object attribute that defines the structure of each array element.

OIBusAttribute.description:
Union type representing all possible OIBus form attributes.
Includes both displayable attributes and array/object containers.

OIBusEnablingCondition.description:
Condition that determines when an attribute should be enabled/disabled.
Used for dynamic form behavior based on other field values.

targetPathFromRoot.description: Path to the attribute that should be enabled/disabled.

referralPathFromRoot.description: Path to the attribute whose value determines the enabling condition.

values.description: Values of the referral attribute that will enable the target attribute.

OIBusObjectDisplayProperties.description:
Display properties for object-type form attributes.
Controls visibility and styling of object containers.

visible.description: Whether this object should be visible in the form.

wrapInBox.description: Whether this object should be wrapped in a visual box/container.

CustomTransformerDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a custom transformer.
Extends the base transformer with custom-specific properties.

id.description: The unique identifier of the transformer.

type.description: The type of the transformer (always 'custom' for this interface).

inputType.description: The input data type that the transformer accepts.

outputType.description: The output data type that the transformer produces.

manifest.description: The manifest describing the transformer's input/output structure and attributes.

name.description: The name of the custom transformer.

description.description: A description of what the custom transformer does.
description.example: Converts string input to numeric output

customCode.description: The custom JavaScript code that implements the transformation logic.

StandardTransformerDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a standard transformer.
Extends the base transformer with standard-specific properties.

id.description: The unique identifier of the transformer.

type.description: The type of the transformer (always 'standard' for this interface).

inputType.description: The input data type that the transformer accepts.

outputType.description: The output data type that the transformer produces.

manifest.description: The manifest describing the transformer's input/output structure and attributes.

functionName.description: The name of the standard function that implements the transformation.

TransformerDTO.description: Union type representing either a custom or standard transformer.

Page_TransformerDTO_.description: Represents a paginated response containing an array of elements.

content.description: The content of the page - an array of elements.

totalElements.description: The total number of elements across all pages.

size.description: The size of the page, i.e., the maximum number of elements per page.

number.description: The number of the current page, starting at 0.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages (which can be 0 if there are no elements).

OIBusDataType.description: Type representing an OIBus data type.

CustomTransformerCommandDTO.description: Command Data Transfer Object for creating or updating a custom transformer.

type.description: The type of the transformer (always 'custom' for this interface).

inputType.description: The input data type that the transformer accepts.

outputType.description: The output data type that the transformer produces.

name.description: The name of the custom transformer.

description.description: A description of what the custom transformer does.
description.example: Converts string input to numeric output

customCode.description: The custom JavaScript code that implements the transformation logic.

customManifest.description: The manifest describing the transformer's input/output structure and attributes.

OIBusSouthType.description: Type representing the possible types for a South connector.

OIBusSouthCategory.description: Type representing the possible categories for a South connector.

SouthType.description:
Represents the type metadata for a South connector.
Describes the basic characteristics and capabilities of a South connector type.

id.description: The unique identifier of the South connector type.

category.description: The category of the South connector.

history.description: Whether this connector supports historical data retrieval.

lastFile.description: Whether this connector supports retrieving the last file.

lastPoint.description: Whether this connector supports retrieving the last data point.

subscription.description: Whether this connector supports real-time subscription mode.

modes.description: The operating modes supported by this connector type.

SouthConnectorManifest.description:
Manifest for a South connector type.
Describes the configuration schema, capabilities, and structure of a South connector type.

id.description: The unique identifier of the South connector type.

category.description: The category of the South connector.

history.description: Whether this connector supports historical data retrieval.

lastFile.description: Whether this connector supports retrieving the last file.

lastPoint.description: Whether this connector supports retrieving the last data point.

subscription.description: Whether this connector supports real-time subscription mode.

modes.description: The operating modes supported by this connector type.

settings.description: The configuration schema for the connector settings.

items.description: The configuration schema for items (data points).

SouthConnectorLightDTO.description:
Lightweight Data Transfer Object for a South connector.
Contains only essential information about a South connector for listing purposes.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

name.description: The name of the South connector.

type.description: The type of the South connector.

description.description: Description of the South connector's purpose.

enabled.description: Whether the South connector is enabled and active.

ScanModeDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a scan mode.
Represents a configured scan mode with its metadata and schedule.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

name.description: The name of the scan mode.

description.description: A description of the scan mode's purpose or behavior.
description.example: Scans for new backup data every day at midnight

cron.description: A cron expression defining the scan schedule.

SouthConnectorItemDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for an item to query within a South connector.
Represents an individual data point or file to be collected.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

name.description: The name of the item.

enabled.description: Whether this item is enabled and should be collected.

scanMode.description: The scan mode configuration for this item.

SouthConnectorDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a South connector.
Contains all configuration details and current state of a South connector.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

name.description: The name of the South connector.

type.description: The type of the South connector.

description.description: Description of the South connector's purpose.

enabled.description: Whether the South connector is enabled and active.

settings.description: Configuration settings specific to this South connector type.

items.description: List of items (data points) configured for this connector.

SouthConnectorItemCommandDTO.description:
Command Data Transfer Object for creating or updating a South connector item.
Used as the request body for South connector item creation/update endpoints.

id.description: The ID of the item (null when creating a new item).

enabled.description: Whether this item should be enabled.

name.description: The name of the item.

scanModeId.description:
The ID of the scan mode to use for this item.
Null when the scan mode should be determined by the system.

scanModeName.description:
The name of the scan mode to use when ID is not available.
Null when not specifying by name.

SouthConnectorCommandDTO.description:
Command Data Transfer Object for creating or updating a South connector.
Used as the request body for South connector creation/update endpoints.

name.description: The name of the South connector.

type.description: The type of the South connector.

description.description: Description of the South connector's purpose.

enabled.description: Whether the South connector should be enabled.

settings.description: Configuration settings specific to this South connector type.

items.description: List of items (data points) to configure for this connector.

data.description: The data associated with the point.

filePath.description: The path to the file containing the content.

SouthConnectorItemTestingSettings.description:
Settings for testing a South connector item.
Used when manually testing data collection for an item.

endTime.description:
End time for historical data test (ISO 8601 format).
Not applicable for folder-scanner as it doesn't support history mode.

startTime.description:
Start time for historical data test (ISO 8601 format).
Not applicable for folder-scanner as it doesn't support history mode.

history.description:
Historical data range for testing.
Undefined when testing real-time data collection (which for folder-scanner means last file).

Page_SouthConnectorItemDTO_.description: Represents a paginated response containing an array of elements.

content.description: The content of the page - an array of elements.

totalElements.description: The total number of elements across all pages.

size.description: The size of the page, i.e., the maximum number of elements per page.

number.description: The number of the current page, starting at 0.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages (which can be 0 if there are no elements).

Record_string.string_.description: Construct a type with a set of properties K of type T

items.description: Array of valid items that can be imported

ScanModeCommandDTO.description:
Command DTO for creating or updating a scan mode.
Used as the request body for scan mode creation/update endpoints.

name.description: The name of the scan mode.

description.description: A description of the scan mode's purpose or behavior.
description.example: Scans for new backup data every day at midnight

cron.description: A cron expression defining the scan schedule.

ValidatedCronExpression.description:
Result of validating a cron expression.
Includes validation status, error messages, and execution details.

isValid.description: Whether the cron expression is valid.

errorMessage.description:
Error message if the cron expression is invalid.
Empty string if the expression is valid.

nextExecutions.description:
The next 5 execution times for the cron expression.
Empty if the expression is invalid.

humanReadableForm.description: A human-readable description of the cron expression.

RegistrationSettingsDTO.description:
Registration settings Data Transfer Object.
Represents the registration settings for the engine.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

status.description: The current registration status.

activationDate.description: The date and time when the activation occurred.

activationExpirationDate.description: The date and time when the activation expires.

checkUrl.description: The URL to check registration status.

useProxy.description: Whether to use a proxy for registration.

commandRefreshInterval.description: The interval in seconds for refreshing commands.

commandRetryInterval.description: The interval in seconds for retrying commands.

messageRetryInterval.description: The interval in seconds for retrying messages.

deleteNorth.description: Permission to delete a north connector.

updateNorth.description: Permission to update a north connector.

createNorth.description: Permission to create a north connector.

createOrUpdateSouthItemsFromCsv.description: Permission to create or update south items from CSV.

updateSouth.description: Permission to update a south connector.

createSouth.description: Permission to create a south connector.

createOrUpdateHistoryItemsFromCsv.description: Permission to create or update history items from CSV.

deleteHistoryQuery.description: Permission to delete a history query.

updateHistoryQuery.description: Permission to update a history query.

createHistoryQuery.description: Permission to create a history query.

deleteIpFilter.description: Permission to delete an IP filter.

createIpFilter.description: Permission to create an IP filter.

deleteScanMode.description: Permission to delete a scan mode.

updateScanMode.description: Permission to update a scan mode.

createScanMode.description: Permission to create a scan mode.

updateVersion.description: Permission to update the engine version.

OIBusUpdateVersionCommandDTO.description: Command DTO for updating the OIBus version.

id.description: The unique identifier of the command.

status.description: The current status of the command.

ack.description: Whether the command has been acknowledged.

retrievedDate.description: The date and time when the command was retrieved.

completedDate.description: The date and time when the command was completed.

result.description: The result of the command execution.

backupFolders.description: The folders to back up before updating.

assetId.description: The asset ID for the update.

commandContent.description: The content of the command, including version details and update options.

EngineSettingsCommandDTO.description:
Engine settings command Data Transfer Object.
Used as the request body for updating engine settings.

name.description: The name of the engine.

port.description: The port on which the engine listens.

proxyPort.description: The port for the proxy, if enabled.

interval.description: The interval in seconds for sending logs to OIA.

level.description: The log level for OIA output.

address.description: The address of the Loki server.

interval.description: The interval in seconds for sending logs to Loki.

level.description: The log level for Loki output.

maxNumberOfLogs.description: The maximum number of logs to keep in the database.

level.description: The log level for database output.

numberOfFiles.description: The number of log files to keep.

maxFileSize.description: The maximum size of a log file in bytes.

level.description: The log level for file output.
The log level for console output.

Used to specify details for certificate generation.

countryName.description: The country name for the certificate.

stateOrProvinceName.description: The state or province name for the certificate.

localityName.description: The locality (e.g., city) name for the certificate.

organizationName.description: The organization name for the certificate.

keySize.description: The key size in bits for the certificate.

daysBeforeExpiry.description: The number of days before the certificate expires.

HistoryQueryCommandDTO.description:
Command Data Transfer Object for creating or updating a history query.
Used as the request body for history query creation/update endpoints.

name.description: The name of the history query.

description.description: Description of the history query's purpose.
description.example: Migrate production data from old to new system

startTime.description: Start time for the data to be queried (ISO 8601 format).

endTime.description: End time for the data to be queried (ISO 8601 format).

southType.description: The type of the South connector to use for data retrieval.

northType.description: The type of the North connector to use for data storage.

southSettings.description: Configuration settings for the South connector.

northSettings.description: Configuration settings for the North connector.

retentionDuration.description: Duration (in ms) to retain archived files.

enabled.description: Whether archiving of processed data is enabled.

retentionDuration.description: Duration (in ms) to retain error files before cleanup.

retryCount.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed operations.

retryInterval.description: Interval (in ms) between retry attempts for failed operations.

maxNumberOfElements.description: Maximum number of elements in the cache before sending.

maxSize.description: Maximum size (in bytes) of the cache before sending.

runMinDelay.description: Minimum delay (in ms) between execution runs.

throttling.description: Throttling configuration to control data flow.

numberOfFiles.description: Number of files to accumulate before triggering a send.

numberOfElements.description: Number of elements to accumulate before triggering a send.

scanModeName.description: Name of the scan mode. Used when ID is not available.

scanModeId.description: ID of the scan mode to use.

trigger.description: Trigger configuration for when to send cached data.

caching.description: Caching configuration for the history query.

items.description: List of items (data points) to be queried.

northTransformers.description:
List of transformers to apply to data before sending to North connector.
Each transformer is referenced by ID with its options.

Page_OIBusCommandDTO_.description: Represents a paginated response containing an array of elements.

content.description: The content of the page - an array of elements.

totalElements.description: The total number of elements across all pages.

size.description: The size of the page, i.e., the maximum number of elements per page.

number.description: The number of the current page, starting at 0.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages (which can be 0 if there are no elements).

LogDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a log entry.
Represents a log with its metadata, severity level, scope, and message content.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the log entry in ISO 8601 format.

level.description: The severity level of the log entry.

scopeType.description: The type of scope the log is associated with (e.g., 'south', 'north').

scopeId.description:
The unique identifier of the scope (e.g., connector ID).
Can be `null` if the log is not associated with a specific scope.

scopeName.description:
The human-readable name of the scope.
Can be `null` if the log is not associated with a specific scope.

message.description: The log message content, including details about the event or error.
message.example: Connection failed to host: timeout after 5s

Page_LogDTO_.description: Represents a paginated response containing an array of elements.

content.description: The content of the page - an array of elements.

totalElements.description: The total number of elements across all pages.

size.description: The size of the page, i.e., the maximum number of elements per page.

number.description: The number of the current page, starting at 0.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages (which can be 0 if there are no elements).

Scope.description:
Represents a scope associated with log entries.
A scope can be a connector, service, or module.

scopeId.description: The unique identifier of the scope (e.g., connector ID, service ID).

scopeName.description: The human-readable name of the scope.

IPFilterDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for an IP filter.
Represents a configured IP filter with its address and description.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

address.description:
The IP address or CIDR block to filter.
Can be an IPv4 address, IPv6 address, or CIDR notation.

description.description: A description of the purpose or reason for this IP filter.
description.example: Allow traffic from the local admin workstation

Engine settings Data Transfer Object.

CertificateDTO.description:
Data Transfer Object for a certificate.
Represents a certificate with its metadata, public key, and expiry information.

id.description: The unique identifier of the entity.

creationDate.description: The date and time when the entity was created.

lastEditInstant.description: The date and time when the entity was last edited.

info.title: OIBus API
info.description: OIBus API is a RESTful interface for managing industrial data flows. It allows you to configure connectors, schedule data collection, transform and route data, monitor system health, and secure communications. Designed for developers and system integrators, it enables seamless integration between industrial systems and enterprise applications.

get.description: Searches for users with optional filtering by login name

post.description: Creates a new user account with the provided details and password

get.description: Retrieves a specific user by their unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing user account with new details

delete.description: Deletes a user account by its unique identifier

post.description: Updates a user's password

get.description: Searches for transformers with optional filtering by type, input type, and output type
Retrieves a complete list of all available transformers
Retrieves a specific transformer by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing custom transformer with new configuration

delete.description: Deletes a transformer by its unique identifier

post.description: Creates a new data transformer with the provided configuration

200.description: Array of south connector type objects

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available south connector types
Retrieves a specific south connector manifest by its type
Retrieves a list of all configured south connectors

post.description: Creates a new south connector with the provided configuration

get.description: Retrieves a specific south connector by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing south connector configuration

delete.description: Deletes a south connector by its ID

post.description: Start a south connector
Stop a south connector
Resets all metrics for a north connector
Tests the connection for a south connector
Test a south connector item

200.description: Array of south connector item objects

get.description: List all items for a south connector
Searches for items in a south connector with optional filtering
Retrieves a specific item from a south connector

put.description: Updates an existing item in a south connector

delete.description: Delete a south item

post.description: Creates a new item in a south connector

delete.description: Deletes all items from a south connector

post.description: Enable a south connector item
Disable a south connector item
Enable a list of south connector items
Disable a list of south connector items
Delete a list of south connector items
Converts frontend in memory items to CSV format
Exports all items from a history query as a CSV file
Validates a CSV file before import and checks for conflicts with existing items
Imports items from a CSV file into a history query

get.description: Retrieves a list of all scan modes

post.description: Creates a new scan mode with the provided configuration

get.description: Retrieves a specific scan mode by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing scan mode with new configuration

delete.description: Deletes a scan mode by its unique identifier

200.description: The cron validation with next execution times

post.description: Validates a cron expression to ensure it's properly formatted

get.description: Returns the current OIAnalytics registration settings

put.description: Updates the connection settings for the OIAnalytics service

post.description: Registers the current instance of OIBus with the OIAnalytics service
Unregister from OIAnalytics service. OIBus will still be registered on OIAnalytics. It must be removed manually

get.description: Searches OIAnalytics commands with optional filtering by type and status.

delete.description: Deletes an OIAnalytics command by its unique identifier

200.description: Array of north connector type objects

get.description: Retrieves a list of all available north connector types
Retrieves a specific north connector manifest by its type
Retrieves a list of all configured north connectors

post.description: Creates a new north connector with the provided configuration

get.description: Retrieves a specific north connector by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing north connector configuration

delete.description: Deletes a north connector by its ID

post.description: Starts a north connector
Stops a north connector
Resets all metrics for a north connector
Tests the connection for a north connector
Adds or updates a transformer configuration for a north connector

delete.description: Remove a transformer from a north connector

post.description: Subscribe to a south connector from a north connector

delete.description: Remove a subscription to a south connector from a north connector

get.description: Searches for files in the north connector cache
Download a cache file from a north connector cache

delete.description: Removes specific files from the north connector cache
Removes all files from a north connector cache folder

post.description: Moves specific files between folders in the north connector cache
Moves all files between folders in the north connector cache

get.description: Searches system logs with various filter parameters. If no time range is specified, defaults to the last 24 hours.
Returns a list of scope suggestions based on the provided name fragment

200.description: Scope object or null if not found

get.description: Retrieves details for a specific log scope by its ID
Retrieves a list of all IP filters

post.description: Creates a new IP filter with the provided configuration

get.description: Retrieves a specific IP filter by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing IP filter with new configuration

delete.description: Deletes an IP filter by its unique identifier

get.description: Retrieves a list of all configured history queries

post.description: Creates a new history query with the provided configuration

get.description: Retrieves a specific history query by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing history query configuration

delete.description: Deletes a history query by its ID

post.description: Starts a history query
Pause a history query
Test north connection for a history query
Test south connection for a history query
Test a history query item

get.description: List all items for a history query
Searches for items in a history query with optional filtering
Retrieves a specific item from a history query

put.description: Updates an existing item in a history query

delete.description: Delete a history query item

post.description: Creates a new item in a history query

delete.description: Delete all items from a history query

post.description: Enable a history query item
Disable a history query item
Enable a list of history query items
Disable a list of history query items
Delete a list of history query items
Converts frontend in memory items to CSV format
Exports all items from a history query as a CSV file
Validates a CSV file before import and checks for conflicts with existing items
Imports items from a CSV file into a history query
Adds or updates a transformer configuration for a history query

delete.description: Remove a transformer from a history query

get.description: Searches for files in the history query cache
Downloads a specific file from the history query cache

delete.description: Removes specific files from the history query cache
Removes all files from the history query cache

post.description: Moves specific files between folders in the history query cache
Moves all files between folders in the history query cache

get.description: Returns the current configuration settings of the OIBus engine

put.description: Updates the configuration settings of the OIBus engine

post.description: Resets all metrics collected by the OIBus engine
Restarts the OIBus process

200.description: OIBus information including version, build, and system details

get.description: Returns version and system information about the OIBus instance
Checks the current status of the OIBus engine
Retrieves a list of all available certificates

post.description: Creates a new certificate with the provided details

get.description: Retrieves a specific certificate by its unique identifier

put.description: Updates an existing certificate with new details

delete.description: Deletes a certificate by its unique identifier
